title: The Lotus Type 136 E-Road Bike Brings Olympic Gold Medal-Winning Design Inspiration
content:
This 9.8 kg e-bike is said to harness Lotus' engineering excellence, but it's going to cost you.

Read the full article at The Lotus Type 136 E-Road Bike Brings Olympic Gold Medal-Winning Design Inspiration on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
